_header: That I spent that I had
Subjects: sermons, verse in; translations; inscriptions; almsgiving
_description: On impediments to almsgiving: inscriptions in four rings found in a sarcophagus (4 lines), a tag in the Fasciculus Morum, with each English translation directly following its Latin equivalent

Bod187.Transcription:
þat y spende þat y haddeThat y ȝaf þat y
                    haueThat y kepte þat y lostffor y wernyd y am pynyd

Bod410.Transcription:
that I spent þat I had þat I ȝef þat haue
                    þat I kept is lost fro myne ffor þat I wernyd now I
                    pyne

BodLauMis213.Transcription:
that I spended I haddethat y yef I hauethat I wist is lost fro
                    myne ffor that I werned now I pyne

BodRawC670.Transcription:
Þat y spende þat y hadÞat y ȝeue þat y
                    haueÞat y kepte ys lost fro myneFor [þat] i warnyt now y
                    pyne
BodRawC670.Editions:
Silverstein,  Theodore,
                        ed.  
             Medieval English Lyrics.
         York Medieval Texts. London: Edw. Arnold, 1971: 97.

OxfCCC218.Transcription:
Þat y ȝete þat y hadÞat y ȝeue þat u
                    haueÞat y kepte þat y lost Þat I warnid I
                    bye

OxfMagd13.Transcription:
Þat I spendud þat I haddeÞat I gife þat I
                    haueÞat I welde I lost from myneFor þat I werned now I
                    pyne
OxfMagd13.Editions:
Wenzel,  Siegfried. 
             Verses in Sermons: ‘Fasciculus morum’ and Its Middle
                English Poems.
         Cambridge, MA: Medieval Academy of America, 1978: 192.

CamGon364.Transcription:
þat i spendyd þat I haddeþat I ȝaf þat i
                    haueþat I wyste I les fro mynffor þat I wernde now i
                    pyne

CamStJohn159.Transcription:
Þat I spendid þat i hadeÞat I gafe þat I
                    hafeÞat I kepid þat is lost fro mynffor þat I warnyd
                    now I pyn

EDU82.Transcription:
That I hete that I hauedThat I ghaue that I haueThat I kepyd
                    that I lostThat I warnet that I by
EDU82.Editions:
Wenzel,  Siegfried. 
             Verses in Sermons: ‘Fasciculus morum’ and Its Middle
                English Poems.
         Cambridge, MA: Medieval Academy of America, 1978: 191-2.

Lincoln44.Transcription:
þat I spend þat I hadeþat I gaue þat I
                    haueþat I kept þat I lostefor þat I wor not
                    noȝt

Spalding.Transcription:
That I spende that I hadthat I gaf that I hauethat I kept is
                    noght myneffor that I warned nowe I pyne

WorcF19.Transcription:
þat y spende y haddeþat y gaf þat y haueþat
                    y wist y lostso [fro?] myn…
WorcF19.Note: Imperfect in this MS, written as prose.
